sentences.en: He tried hard to satisfy me of his sincerity.
sentences.cn: 他竭力让我了解他的诚意.

sentences.en: His honesty and sincerity prejudiced us in his favour.
sentences.cn: 他的真诚使我们对他产生好感.

sentences.en: His sincerity added much more authority to the story.
sentences.cn: 他的真诚更增加了故事的说服力.

sentences.en: His sincerity is not in question.

sentences.cn: 他的诚意是无容置疑的.

sentences.en: I don't believe in Tom's sincerity ; but this is inter nos.
sentences.cn: 我不相信汤姆是有诚意的; 不过这是不能对外人讲的.

sentences.en: I don’t doubt her sincerity, but I think she’s got her facts wrong.
sentences.cn: 我不怀疑她的诚意，但我认为她没弄清楚事实。

sentences.en: I don't doubt the girl's sincerity.
sentences.cn: 我不怀疑那个女孩的真诚.

sentences.en: I was impressed with his deep sincerity.
sentences.cn: 他的无比真诚让我印象深刻。

sentences.en: May I say in all sincerity that we could not have achieved this much without your help and support.
sentences.cn: 请允许我真心诚意地说: 没有你们的帮助和支持，我们就不可能取得这样的成绩。

sentences.en: the artless sincerity of a young child
The film is made with sincerity.
sentences.cn: 这是部非常诚挚的电影作品。

sentences.en: The little girl persuaded me of her sincerity.
sentences.cn: 小女孩使我相信她的真诚.

sentences.en: There was a ring of sincerity in his promise.
sentences.cn: 他的许诺中有一种真诚的语气.

sentences.en: There was no mistaking Magda's sincerity, or her pain.
sentences.cn: 玛格达的真诚和痛苦都绝不可能是假装的。

sentences.en: They raised a query on his sincerity.
sentences.cn: 他们对他是否真诚提出质疑.

sentences.en: Tom can't persuade himself of my sincerity.
sentences.cn: 汤姆始终无法说服自己相信我的诚实.

words.tran_cn: 率直,坦白,彻底,诚实,自然
